title: Creation: Mankind - the Image of God
description:
Readings from:
Genesis 1:26-31
Today's passages were read by Daniel Im, a pastor, podcaster, and author of several books, most recently You Are What You Do: And Six Other Lies about Work, Life, and Love.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
